full_summary:
### ALSE - Life Rafts and Survival Kits Tender

#### Background

The Department of National Defence (DND), Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM), issues this tender for the sustainment and delivery of Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE)/Search & Rescue – Aerial Delivery (SAR-AD) in-service support (ISS) and Repair and/or Overhaul (R&O) services for Life Rafts and Survival Kits. This support will be provided to the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) for their worldwide operations.

#### Timeline

*   **Publication Date:** 2023-03-01
*   **Tender Closing Date:** All bids must be submitted by 2023-05-16T14:00:00 and should be electronically transmitted via the epost Connect service.
*   **Amendment Date:** The third amendment to this tender was issued on 2023-05-12

#### Requirements

As per Annex A Performance Work Statement and Annex C Security Requirement Check List, the bidder should be aware of the following:

*   They are required to provide in-service support, repairs, and modifications for Life Rafts and Survival Kits as per Annex B Basis of Payment.
*   There are security requirements associated with this requirement.
*   The bidder should refer to Part 6 - Security and Other Requirements, and Part 7- Resulting Contract Clauses.
*   The labour rates for subcontracting must never be in excess of the rate in effect under the Basis of Payment.


#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **Contact Person:** Lebel, Danny
*   **Email:** dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** Not provided


#### Additional Information

*   The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Bidders can submit their proposal documents in either English or French.
*   The Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada website (http://ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html) contains more information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses.

You can find the tender document and submission guidelines at the following links:

*   English documents: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/01/c168f6ed67bc54c32e090c0993be415b/w8485-23sl02_a
